title: Otherwise known as Sheila the great
brief_description: Ten year old Sheila Tubman faces some of her worst fears, including swimming, dogs and the dark, when her family spends the summer in the countryside of Tarrytown. In Tarrytown, Sheila meets Mouse Ellis, Junior Yo Yo Champion, dog lover and terrific swimmer. Sheila pretends to Mouse that she is not afraid of anything…but Mouse is not fooled. Based on the story by best-selling children’s writer, Judy Blume.
